feed.title: BORIS is an easy-to-use event logging software for video/audio coding and live observations.

entry.title: 2021-09-20: v. 7.12.2 is available
entry.content: Experimental v. 7.12.2 is available. The coding Pad was improved: color mode (by behaviors or behavioral categories), buttons color and font size can be customized.
entry.summary: Experimental v. 7.12.2 is available. The coding Pad was improved: color mode (by behaviors or behavioral categories), buttons color and font size can be customized.

entry.title: 2021-06-10: Experimental v. 8.0.8 is available
entry.content: Experimental v. 8.0.8 is available. A real-time events plot function was added (See Tools > Plot events in real time).
entry.summary: Experimental v. 8.0.8 is available. A real-time events plot function was added (See Tools > Plot events in real time).

entry.title: 2021-05-25: Experimental v. 8.0.5 is available
entry.content: Experimental v. 8.0.5 is available. The MPV media player replaced VLC for great improvements! See http://www.boris.unito.it/pages/boris_v8.html for details
entry.summary: Experimental v. 8.0.5 is available. The MPV media player replaced VLC for great improvements! See http://www.boris.unito.it/pages/boris_v8.html for details

entry.title: 2021-05-13: Experimental v. 8.0.4 is available
entry.content: Experimental v. 8.0.4 is available. The MPV media player replaced VLC for great improvements! See http://www.boris.unito.it/pages/boris_v8.html for details
entry.summary: Experimental v. 8.0.4 is available. The MPV media player replaced VLC for great improvements! See http://www.boris.unito.it/pages/boris_v8.html for details

entry.title: 2021-05-12: v. 7.10.5 is available
entry.content: v. 7.10.5 is available. Set max play rate to 100x, a bug fixed
entry.summary: v. 7.10.5 is available. Set max play rate to 100x, a bug fixed
